channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bull Market Perception vs. Reality
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Market breadth looks strong, liquidity is surging, and the economic data keeps surprising to the upside—yet headlines still scream doo...

item.title: Fooled by Bearishness
item.description: Hey, Ross here! At first glance, insider selling looks extreme—and bearish. But when I dug into the data, I saw a different story. Most insiders are j...

item.title: The Earnings Overreaction Opportunity
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Analysts are scrambling to revise earnings estimates higher—and that’s a bullish sign most people are missing. The S&P 500’s EPS Revis...

item.title: Textbook Breakout Setup
item.description: Hey, Ross here! While the headlines focused on the S&P 500’s flat day, the Equal Weight S&P 500 quietly surged 1.27%—a clear sign of strength beneath ...

item.title: Underrated Sector Driving the Market
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Auto stocks have quietly outperformed the S&P 500—and even kept pace with tech—since the April bottom. Yet almost no one’s talking abo...
